concept.title: Select item to attach to this DWG
concept.shortdesc: The Select item to attach to this DWG dialog box enables you to attach point cloud files that have already been processed and stored in the cache.

section.title: Cache used
section.p: Specifies the total amount of used cache.

section.title: Available
section.p: Specifies the total amount of available cache. The available cache is controlled by the POINTCLOUDCACHESIZE system variable.

section.title: Dataset
section.p: Displays a list of cached point cloud files including their names and locations. You can select a cached file from the list to attach to the current drawing.

section.title: Size
section.p: Displays the amount of cache used for each point cloud file.

section.title: OK
section.p: Displays the Attach point cloud dialog box where you can specify how to attach the selected point cloud file to the current drawing.

section.title: Cancel
section.p: Closes the dialog box without attaching a point cloud file.
